result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Defn' motion for substitution of Judge-GRANTED (within time limits and no co-defn)
Letter from defn requesting SPD representation; defn eligible and waiting on services
waiver of right to attorney for bail/bond hearing only

10:52 AM Defendant Sidney R Foster in court, in custody.  Attorney Hector Al-Homsi in court for State of Wisconsin. CT has colloquy about right to attorney, defn wants to waive right to attorney for this hearing only. CT accepts waiver knowingly, intelligently, and voluntarily. Defn requesting signature bond. Argument by State. Argument by defn. CT denies bail motion. ALL CONDITIONS REMAIN THE SAME>
Bail/bond hearing on September 29, 2022 at 10:45 am.

- Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with SH.
- Defendant shall not be on the 2500 block of Calypso Road in Madison.
Trial Judge - Br 12

2:29 PM Defendant Sidney R. Foster in court in custody.  Attorney Devonte D. Windham in court for Sidney R Foster.  Prosecuting attorney Tomas Fernando Valerio in court for the State of Wisconsin. The defendant was advised regarding their right to an attorney and to the SPD application process if not already represented. Defendant received a copy of the Complaint and waived reading. Court entered Not Guilty pleas as to any misdemeanor counts.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for December 2, 2022 at 11:15 am.
Pre-trial conference on December 2, 2022 at 11:15 am.
